desc: Craft Ales and freshly poured pints, ready to takeaway or delivered to your door in Mumbles & Swansea.

layout.text: TAP ROOM OFFERING FRESH CRAFT BEER, ALE AND CIDER ON TAP
EXTRA FRESH BEER DELIVERED TO YOUR DOOR NEXT DAY
ORDER BY THE CAN, BOTTLE, 3.3 PINT GROWLER OR 4 PINT POUCH
SHOP ONLINE, IN-STORE OR CLICK & COLLECT
